dakshina lankawe upa pradhana adhikarana sanghanayaka ha mathara isipathanaramadhipathi rajakiya panditha pujya thalahagama gnyanarathana swamin wahanse athulu maha sangharathnaya saha anyagamika pujakawarun da, amathya mangala samarawira, niyojya amathya buddhika pathirana, dakunu palath pradhana amathya shan wijayalal da silwa, parlimenthu manthri chandrasiri gajadhira, palath amathyawarun wana chandima rasaputhra, manoj sirisena yana mahathwarun athulu mahajana niyojithayan rasak da, mathara disthrik lekam pradip rathnayaka mahatha athulu rajya niladharin saha polispathi pujitha jayasundara mahatha athulu aarakshaka ansha pradhanihu mema awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha.
